system.description:
Has the power to return the dead to life.

  • Useage restriction: Usable by divine spell casters only.

  • Effect: A deceased person within 120’ is restored to life with full hit points. A person who has been dead for up to 100 years may be resurrected. The number of charges expended depends on the race of the person (see table below).

  • Useage frequency: The rod can be used at most once per day.

Rod of Resurrection: Charges per Use

Subject’s RaceCharges
Dwarf (incl. duergar)3
Elf (incl. drow)4
Gnome (incl. svirfneblin)3
Half-elf2
Halfling2
Half-orc4
Human1
Other4
